include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (GOOGLEBENCH_ARCHIVE "${GOOGLEBENCH_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/src/libbenchmark.a")

register_external_lib (googlebench ${GOOGLEBENCH_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${GOOGLEBENCH_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${GOOGLEBENCH_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${GOOGLEBENCH_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/include")
